song.englishname: Create in Me a Clean Heart

english.segment1: Chorus: Create in me a clean heart, and purify me (purify me) (purify me). Create in me a clean heart, so that I may worship Thee.
english.segment2: Bridge: Cast me not away from Thy presence. Please don't take Your spirit from me. And restore the joy of my salvation. So that I may worship Thee.
english.segment6: Ending: So that I may worship Thee. So that I may worship Thee. So that I may worship Thee
